title: Brandy snap baskets with white chocolate

default: 200g/8oz fresh raspberries or strawberries and other mixed soft fruit

steps: Melt white chocolate with the double cream together in a bowl over hot water (not boiling) until the chocolate just melts (do not allow to get too hot or it will become grainy and will not set firm when cold).
Mix with the créme fraîche until smooth.
Pour into the brandy snap cases.
Top with the fruits to serve.
